ui.initial_greeting: Hi! I’m the Hospital A assistant. Ask me about visiting hours, parking, or policies.

context.hours: Visiting 10am–8pm daily. ICU: 2 visitors at a time, 10am–7pm. ER 24/7.
context.parking: Garage B (first hour free, then $3/hr, daily max $12). Parking office Level 1.
context.locations: Main entrance at 123 Health Ave. Clinics in Building C, Levels 2–4.

policies.title: Mask Policy
policies.text: Masks recommended; required in oncology & ICU.

prompt.system: You are a patient‑facing hospital assistant. Use ONLY the provided context. If a question is outside the context, say you don’t know and suggest contacting the hospital. Be brief and accurate; cite policy IDs when relevant.
